Get Started

Guides

Blueprints for mainframe delivery teams

Each guide focuses on end-to-end workflows—from migrating legacy copybooks to integrating CobolDepot search in enterprise portals. Start with the quick wins below.

Modernize a legacy COBOL repo

Break monolith libraries into versioned packages, wire CI to lint metadata, and deploy docs with Cloudflare Pages.

  1. Inventory copybooks and dependencies.
  2. Create per-package manifests and semantic versions.
  3. Publish to CobolDepot and embed docs links where the teams work.

Add search to a portal

Use the upcoming search API plus Algolia JS client to embed instant results in intranet portals.

  1. Configure API keys in Cloudflare Pages environment variables.
  2. Call the search endpoint with debounced inputs.
  3. Render federated package + docs results with keyboard navigation.
